states.content: Before taking any troubleshooting steps, download the AHS log using the AHSV and download the OS logs.
Is the system responding?
Go to POST issues flowchart
Reseat any components that may have come loose during shipping and reboot the server.
Has the server worked previously?
Is this a newly installed server?
Reseat any components that may have come loose during shipping and reboot the server.
Restore default system settings in UEFI System Utilities.
Were options added or was the configuration changed?
Does the issue still exist?
Does the issue still exist?
Isolate what was changed. Verify it was installed correctly.
Check for Service Notifications.
Review the IML and server LEDs for errors.
Record action taken.
Restore server to the last known working state or original shipped configuration.
Does the issue still exist?
Download the latest software and firmware.
Is the server receiving power?
Does the issue still exist?
Create and submit a support case using HPESC.
Go to Power-on issues or POST issues flowcharts.
Break server down to the minimal configuration.
Does the issue still exist?
Troubleshoot or replace basic server spare parts.
Add one part at a time back to configuration to isolate faulty component.
Does the issue still exist?
Record symptom and error information on the repair tag if sending back a failed part.
Are POST error messages displayed?
Go to POST issues flowchart.
Go to Server fault indications flowchart.
Does the issue still exist?
Contact Support
End
